item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, August 29, 2024 at 10:15 AM UTC
item.description:

24. Type 2 diabetes drug associated with 35% lower risk of dementia, study finds (4 points | 1 comment)
25. Microsoft donates the Mono Project to the Wine team (1386 points | 457 comments)
26. A Video Game Dynamo with Ideas Always Swirling (46 points | 7 comments)
27. Diffusion models are real-time game engines (1082 points | 391 comments)

29. NASA Discovers a Long-Sought Global Electric Field on Earth (37 points | 12 comments)
